upcoming.title: Introduction to PCB Designing
upcoming.info: This workshop will cover the basics of PCB design, its terminologies, basics to schematic, footprint creation, placement & route and various other topics.

past.title: Internet of Things and it's Applications
past.info: This workshop will help you to learn and explore the internet of things, so don't miss this opportunity.
